data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Viraktamath, C. A., Webb, M. D. (2018): Revision of the evacanthine leafhoppers (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Evacanthinae) of the Indian subcontinent. Zootaxa 4386 (1): 1-78, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4386.1.1|84 occurrences
